languages.text: {n}Фигура в одеяниях склоняет голову. А затем начинает говорить.{/n} "Изгой Ирлиэт. Ты сошла с пути, что был тебе указан. Привела чужих {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} к нашему убежищу. И ныне говоришь со мной в неподобающем гневе. Долгие странствия вдали от Крудараха изменили твой разум и осквернили глаза".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фигура в одеяниях склоняет голову. А затем начинает говорить.{/n} "Изгой Ирлиэт. Ты сошла с пути, что был тебе указан. Привела чужих {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} к нашему убежищу. И ныне говоришь со мной в неподобающем гневе. Долгие странствия вдали от Крудараха изменили твой разум и осквернили глаза".

languages.text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."
languages.original_text: {n}Фигура в одеяниях склоняет голову. А затем начинает говорить.{/n} "Изгой Ирлиэт. Ты сошла с пути, что был тебе указан. Привела чужих {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} к нашему убежищу. И ныне говоришь со мной в неподобающем гневе. Долгие странствия вдали от Крудараха изменили твой разум и осквернили глаза".

traits.locale_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown mon-keigh to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. State your reason."

Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

{n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

languages.text: {n}那个穿着长袍的身影歪了歪头，之后开了口。{/n}“流浪者伊莉耶特，你背弃了我们为你安排好的道途，将陌生的{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}带到了我们的避难所。而现在，你又毫无体面地对我气急败坏。你在远离克鲁达拉赫的地方游荡了太久。这扭曲了你的思想，让你目不视物。”
languages.original_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个穿着长袍的身影歪了歪头，之后开了口。{/n}“流浪者伊莉耶特，你背弃了我们为你安排好的道途，将陌生的{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}带到了我们的避难所。而现在，你又毫无体面地对我气急败坏。你在远离克鲁达拉赫的地方游荡了太久。这扭曲了你的思想，让你目不视物。”

languages.text: {n}ローブ姿の人物は首を傾げ、話し始める。{/n}「追放者ユリエットよ。お前は用意された道を外れた。誰とも知れぬ{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}を我らの隠れ家に連れ込んだ。そして今は、無礼にも私に怒りをぶつけている。長くクルダラを離れて放浪したせいで、心は歪み目は曇ったようだな」
languages.original_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}ローブ姿の人物は首を傾げ、話し始める。{/n}「追放者ユリエットよ。お前は用意された道を外れた。誰とも知れぬ{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}を我らの隠れ家に連れ込んだ。そして今は、無礼にも私に怒りをぶつけている。長くクルダラを離れて放浪したせいで、心は歪み目は曇ったようだな」

languages.text: {n}Die Gestalt in Robe senkt den Kopf. Und dann beginnt sie zu sprechen.{/n} "Yrliet, die Ausgestoßene. Ihr habt den Pfad verlassen, der Euch vorbestimmt war. Ihr brachtet unbekannte {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} in unsere Zuflucht. Und jetzt sprecht Ihr zu mir in unziemlichem Zorn. Eure langen Wanderungen fernab von Crudarach haben Euren Verstand verändert und Euren Blick getrübt."
languages.original_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gestalt in Robe senkt den Kopf. Und dann beginnt sie zu sprechen.{/n} "Yrliet, die Ausgestoßene. Ihr habt den Pfad verlassen, der Euch vorbestimmt war. Ihr brachtet unbekannte {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} in unsere Zuflucht. Und jetzt sprecht Ihr zu mir in unziemlichem Zorn. Eure langen Wanderungen fernab von Crudarach haben Euren Verstand verändert und Euren Blick getrübt."

languages.text: {n}L'individu en robe incline la tête, puis il prend la parole.{/n} « Yrliet l'Errante. Vous avez abandonné la Voie qui vous avait été tracée, amené {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} {mf|inconnu|inconnue} dans notre refuge et maintenant, vous m'accablez de reproches irréfléchis. Vos longs voyages loin de Crudarach ont altéré votre esprit et embrumé votre vision. »
languages.original_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'individu en robe incline la tête, puis il prend la parole.{/n} « Yrliet l'Errante. Vous avez abandonné la Voie qui vous avait été tracée, amené {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} {mf|inconnu|inconnue} dans notre refuge et maintenant, vous m'accablez de reproches irréfléchis. Vos longs voyages loin de Crudarach ont altéré votre esprit et embrumé votre vision. »

languages.text: {n}La figura con túnica inclina la cabeza y habla.{/n} «Proscrita Yrliet. Has abandonado la senda que se te ha encomendado. Has traído a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} desconocidos a nuestro refugio. Y ahora te diriges a mí con una ira indecorosa. Tus viajes errantes lejos de Crudarach han perjudicado tu mente y nublado tus ojos».
languages.original_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}La figura con túnica inclina la cabeza y habla.{/n} «Proscrita Yrliet. Has abandonado la senda que se te ha encomendado. Has traído a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} desconocidos a nuestro refugio. Y ahora te diriges a mí con una ira indecorosa. Tus viajes errantes lejos de Crudarach han perjudicado tu mente y nublado tus ojos».

languages.text: {n}Cübbeli kişi, başını öne eğip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Yurtsuz Yrliet. Sana çizilen yoldan saptın. Sığınağımıza tanımadığımız bir {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} soktun. Şimdi de bana, yakışıksız bir öfkeyle hitap ediyorsun. Crudarach'tan uzaktaki uzun gezmelerin aklını bir başka hâle getirmiş, görüşüne leke sürmüş."
languages.original_text: {n}The robed figure inclines their head. And then they begin to speak.{/n} "Yrliet the Outcast. You left the path that was set out for you. You brought unknown {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} to our refuge. And now you speak to me with unseemly anger. Your long wanderings far from Crudarach have altered your mind and tainted your sight."

Şimdi de bana, yakışıksız bir öfkeyle hitap ediyorsun. Crudarach'tan uzaktaki uzun gezmelerin aklını bir başka hâle getirmiş, görüşüne leke sürmüş."
